Author: shibol
Content:
Been seeing a lot of acquaintances pass away, and see they have rather peculiar burial ceremony spending fortunes for their caskets and prayer ceremonies.

Personal favorites for me, I would sign a do not resuscitate and people can just throw my body to a river, cremate me, turn me into plant fertilizer, donate my body to science, sky burial, or maybe somehow my body gets to the black market and sold for bitcoin. By then maybe bitcoin will equal to the whole gdp of jabodetabek.

What about you?

Author: dusman05
Content: Donate my organs to people who need it

Author: mazeltof404
Content: Ibid dusman. Then have my corpse reduced to ashes, use it as a fertilizer for planting cannabis. My grandchild can smoke OG Tota Genkai & relive my memory

Author: kaviarormonroe
Content: Donate some parts, cremate some parts, and i want the rest to be preserved and taxidermied to give to my friends
